message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get closer to its perceived value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. While I understand your perspective on the value, $850,000 is still quite a bit below what I need to make this deal work. How about we split the difference and settle on $900,000? I believe this price is fair considering the product's value to you and my own needs.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so how about $875,000?
